articles.description: Yes Bank shares have gained more than 20% in the last week to hit their highest level since January 2021. The shares soared to a 52-week high of Rs 17.90 on Tuesday, on the back of reports of PE giants infusing $1.1 billion in the private lender.
articles.content:
Yes Bank Share Price: What is happening?
